name: Shrouded Daggers
description: Fire a secret dagger from your sleeve that bounces up to 3 times to nearby enemies, dealing 1799 Physical Damage per hit.    If enemies hit are casting they are interrupted, set Off Balance, and stunned for 3 seconds.  You also gain Major Brutality and Sorcery, increasing your Weapon and Spell Damage by 20% for 20 seconds.
effectLines: Increases the damage, and the dagger now bounces up to a total of three times.
coefDescription: Fire a secret dagger from your sleeve that bounces up to 3 times to nearby enemies, dealing $1 Physical Damage per hit.    If enemies hit are casting they are interrupted, set Off Balance, and stunned for 3 seconds.  You also gain Major Brutality and Sorcery, increasing your Weapon and Spell Damage by 20% for 20 seconds.
